function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Closure of women shelters during the pandemic severely limited services provided to callers","Impact":"Increased risk of lack of support for women in abusive situations, leading to potential escalation of violence","Mitigation":"Reopen women shelters with proper safety measures and provide alternative support mechanisms such as online counseling","Technologies":"Remote counseling platforms, safety protocols for in-person services","People":"Women in abusive situations, domestic violence survivors","Owner":"Government, organizations providing support services"},{"Description":"Delay in accessing microlevel data for calls during 2020","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the impact of the pandemic on call volumes and the effectiveness of support services","Mitigation":"Implement interim data collection methods, analyze aggregated data with caution, prioritize timely release of microlevel data","Technologies":"Data collection apps, statistical analysis software","People":"Research analysts, government agencies, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reduced variance in the aggregated data may prevent identification of statistically significant effects","Impact":"Inability to accurately capture and analyze trends and impacts of the pandemic on call volumes","Mitigation":"Use complementary statistical methods, conduct sensitivity analyses, prioritize data collection at multiple levels of granularity","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling, sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
